title: ELITE MEDIA BUYER
job_overview:
WE'RE HIRING: ELITE MEDIA BUYER (Part-Time)

Location: Remote | Commitment: 4 Hours/Day (Flexible Shifts)
Industry: E-commerce (Health & Beauty)
Salary: 4-5 USD/hour + Performance-Based Bonuses

[ READ IN FULL TO GET A CHANCE]

Are You a Media Buying Pro Who Thrives in Fast-Moving Ecom Environments?

- We’re looking for a highly analytical, proactive, and communicative Media Buyer to manage and scale Meta campaigns across 30+ ad accounts in our growing e-commerce portfolio.

- You’ll be working closely with our creative and marketing team to optimize daily ad spend of $7k+, spot bottlenecks, and deliver sharp campaign insights that drive real revenue.

WHAT YOU’LL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR:

- Managing, testing & scaling Meta campaigns with $7,000+ daily ad spend
- Handling 30+ ad accounts with clarity and efficiency
- Creating and updating daily campaign reports (performance, metrics, suggestions)
- Using Google Sheets to track KPIs, identify bottlenecks, and present clear overviews to the team
- Communicating campaign updates across departments during 2 daily shifts
- Constantly monitoring performance to reduce waste and increase overall ROAS 

WHO YOU ARE:

- A clear communicator with excellent written & verbal skills
- Deeply experienced in e-commerce media buying
- Have hands-on experience managing high ad spend accounts
- Obsessed with data and reporting—Google Sheets is your second home
- Calm under pressure, proactive with problems, and hungry for growth

WORK SCHEDULE:
- 4 hours per day, split into 2 shifts (morning + evening)
- Must be available every day of the week.
- Daily reporting + team sync required

WHY JOIN US?
- Work with a fast-scaling dropshipping brand in health & beauty
- Make a real impact and have your insights heard and implemented
- Transparent, no-fluff communication culture

READY TO APPLY?
Send us:

- A brief intro (no novels) with the word "KILLER"
- Proof of past results (screenshots, case studies welcome)
- Video intro is a big bonus
